ayas.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

ayas.arabic: طه
ayas.translation: Ta Ha.
ayas.transliteration: ṭā hā

ayas.arabic: مَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِتَشْقَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: We have not revealed the Quran to you that you may be unsuccessful.
ayas.transliteration: mā anzalnā `alaykal qur-āna litashqā

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا تَذْكِرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
ayas.translation: Nay, it is a reminder to him who fears:
ayas.transliteration: illā tadhkiratan liman yakhshā

ayas.arabic: تَنزِيلًا مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلْعُلَى
ayas.translation: A revelation from Him Who created the earth and the high heavens.
ayas.transliteration: tanzīlan mimman khalaqal-arḍa was samāwātil `ulā

ayas.arabic: ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱسْتَوَىٰ
ayas.translation: The Beneficent Allah is firm in power.
ayas.transliteration: ar-raḥmānu `alal-`arshis-tawā

ayas.arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحْتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ
ayas.translation: His is what is in the heavens and what is in the earth and what is between them two and what is beneath the ground.
ayas.transliteration: lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi wa mā baynahumā wa mā taḥtath tharā

ayas.arabic: وَإِن تَجْهَرْ بِٱلْقَوْلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخْفَى
ayas.translation: And if you utter the saying aloud, then surely He knows the secret, and what is yet more hidden.
ayas.transliteration: wa in tajhar bil qawli fa-innahu ya`lamus sirra wa-akhfā

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
ayas.translation: Allah-- there is no god but He; His are the very best names.
ayas.transliteration: allāhu lā ilāha illā huw ۖ lahul-asmā-ul ḥusnā

ayas.arabic: وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: And has the story of Musa come to you?
ayas.transliteration: wahal atāka ḥadīthu mūsā

ayas.arabic: إِذْ رَءَا نَارًا فَقَالَ لِأَهْلِهِ ٱمْكُثُوٓا۟ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا لَّعَلِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوْ أَجِدُ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ هُدًى
ayas.translation: When he saw fire, he said to his family: Stop, for surely I see a fire, haply I may bring to you therefrom a live coal or find a guidance at the fire.
ayas.transliteration: idh ra-ā nāran faqāla li-ahlihim-kuthū innī ānastu nāral la`allī ātīkum minhā biqabasin aw ajidu `alan nāri hudā

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَتَىٰهَا نُودِىَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: So when he came to it, a voice was uttered: O Musa:
ayas.transliteration: falammā atāhā nūdiya yāmūsā

ayas.arabic: إِنِّىٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخْلَعْ نَعْلَيْكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
ayas.translation: Surely I am your Lord, therefore put off your shoes; surely you are in the sacred valley, Tuwa,
ayas.transliteration: innī ana rabbuka fakhla` na`layk ۖ innaka bil wādil muqaddasi ṭuwā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَا ٱخْتَرْتُكَ فَٱسْتَمِعْ لِمَا يُوحَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed:
ayas.transliteration: wa-anakh-tartuka fastami` limā yūḥā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّنِىٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدْنِى وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكْرِىٓ
ayas.translation: Surely I am Allah, there is no god but I, therefore serve Me and keep up prayer for My remembrance:
ayas.transliteration: innanī anallāhu lā ilāha illā ana fa`budnī wa-aqimiṣ ṣalāta lidhikrī

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخْفِيهَا لِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا تَسْعَىٰ
ayas.translation: Surely the hour is coming-- I am about to make it manifest-- so that every soul may be rewarded as it strives:
ayas.transliteration: innas sā`ata ātiyatun akādu ukhfīhā litujzā kullu nafsin bimā tas`ā

ayas.arabic: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنْهَا مَن لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرْدَىٰ
ayas.translation: Therefore let not him who believes not in it and follows his low desires turn you away from it so that you should perish;
ayas.transliteration: falā yaṣuddannaka `anhā man lā yu-minu bihā wattaba`a hawāhu fatardā

ayas.arabic: وَمَا تِلْكَ بِيَمِينِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: And what is this in your right hand, O Musa!
ayas.transliteration: wa mā tilka biyamīnika yāmūsā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ هِىَ عَصَاىَ أَتَوَكَّؤُا۟ عَلَيْهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِى وَلِىَ فِيهَا مَـَٔارِبُ أُخْرَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: This is my staff: I recline on it and I beat the leaves with it to make them fall upon my sheep, and I have other uses for it.
ayas.transliteration: qāla hiya `aṣāya atawakka-u `alayhā wa-ahushhu bihā `alā ghanamī waliya fīhā ma-āribu ukhrā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ أَلْقِهَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: Cast it down, O Musa!
ayas.transliteration: qāla alqihā yāmūsā

ayas.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰهَا فَإِذَا هِىَ حَيَّةٌ تَسْعَىٰ
ayas.translation: So he cast it down; and lo! it was a serpent running.
ayas.transliteration: fa-alqāhā fa-idhā hiya ḥayyatun tas`ā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ خُذْهَا وَلَا تَخَفْ ۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: Take hold of it and fear not; We will restore it to its former state:
ayas.transliteration: qāla khudh-hā walā takhaf ۖ sanu`īduhā sīratahal-ūlā

ayas.arabic: وَٱضْمُمْ يَدَكَ إِلَىٰ جَنَاحِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ءَايَةً أُخْرَىٰ
ayas.translation: And press your hand to your side, it shall come out white without evil: another sign:
ayas.transliteration: waḍmum yadaka ilā janāḥika takhruj bayḍā-a min ghayri sū-in āyatan ukhrā

ayas.arabic: لِنُرِيَكَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا ٱلْكُبْرَى
ayas.translation: That We may show you of Our greater signs:
ayas.transliteration: linuriyaka min āyātinal kubrā

ayas.arabic: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
ayas.translation: Go to Firon, surely he has exceeded all limits.
ayas.transliteration: idh-hab ilā fir`awna innahu ṭaghā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱشْرَحْ لِى صَدْرِى
ayas.translation: He said: O my Lord! Expand my breast for me,
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbish-raḥ lī ṣadrī

ayas.arabic: وَيَسِّرْ لِىٓ أَمْرِى
ayas.translation: And make my affair easy to me,
ayas.transliteration: wayassir lī amrī

ayas.arabic: وَٱحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِّن لِّسَانِى
ayas.translation: And loose the knot from my tongue,
ayas.transliteration: wāḥlul `uqdatan min lisānī

ayas.arabic: يَفْقَهُوا۟ قَوْلِى
ayas.translation: (That) they may understand my word;
ayas.transliteration: yafqahū qawlī

ayas.arabic: وَٱجْعَل لِّى وَزِيرًا مِّنْ أَهْلِى
ayas.translation: And give to me an aider from my family:
ayas.transliteration: waj`al lī wazīran min ahlī

ayas.arabic: هَـٰرُونَ أَخِى
ayas.translation: Haroun, my brother,
ayas.transliteration: hārūna akhi

ayas.arabic: ٱشْدُدْ بِهِۦٓ أَزْرِى
ayas.translation: Strengthen my back by him,
ayas.transliteration: ush-dud bihi azrī

ayas.arabic: وَأَشْرِكْهُ فِىٓ أَمْرِى
ayas.translation: And associate him (with me) in my affair,
ayas.transliteration: wa-ashrik-hu fī amrī

ayas.arabic: كَىْ نُسَبِّحَكَ كَثِيرًا
ayas.translation: So that we should glorify Thee much,
ayas.transliteration: kay nusabbiḥaka kathīrā

ayas.arabic: وَنَذْكُرَكَ كَثِيرًا
ayas.translation: And remember Thee oft.
ayas.transliteration: wanadhkuraka kathīrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّكَ كُنتَ بِنَا بَصِيرًا
ayas.translation: Surely, Thou art seeing us.
ayas.transliteration: innaka kunta binā baṣīrā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ قَدْ أُوتِيتَ سُؤْلَكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: You are indeed granted your petition, O Musa
ayas.transliteration: qāla qad ūtīta su-laka yāmūsā

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَيْكَ مَرَّةً أُخْرَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: And certainly We bestowed on you a favor at another time;
ayas.transliteration: walaqad manannā `alayka marratan ukhrā

ayas.arabic: إِذْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: When We revealed to your mother what was revealed;
ayas.transliteration: idh awḥaynā ilā ummika mā yūḥā

ayas.arabic: أَنِ ٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ فَلْيُلْقِهِ ٱلْيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأْخُذْهُ عَدُوٌّ لِّى وَعَدُوٌّ لَّهُۥ ۚ وَأَلْقَيْتُ عَلَيْكَ مَحَبَّةً مِّنِّى وَلِتُصْنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيْنِىٓ
ayas.translation: Saying: Put him into a chest, then cast it down into the river, then the river shall throw him on the shore; there shall take him up one who is an enemy to Me and enemy to him, and I cast down upon you love from Me, and that you might be brought up before My eyes;
ayas.transliteration: aniq-dhifīhi fit tābūti faqdhifīhi fil yammi falyulqihil yammu bis sāḥili ya-khudh-hu `aduwwul lī wa`aduwwul lah ۚ wa-alqaytu `alayka maḥabbatan minnī walituṣna`a `alā `aynī

ayas.arabic: إِذْ تَمْشِىٓ أُخْتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن يَكْفُلُهُۥ ۖ فَرَجَعْنَـٰكَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ كَىْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَ ۚ وَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًا فَنَجَّيْنَـٰكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ وَفَتَنَّـٰكَ فُتُونًا ۚ فَلَبِثْتَ سِنِينَ فِىٓ أَهْلِ مَدْيَنَ ثُمَّ جِئْتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَرٍ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: When your sister went and said: Shall I direct you to one who will take charge of him? So We brought you back to your mother, that her eye might be cooled and she should not grieve and you killed a man, then We delivered you from the grief, and We tried you with (a severe) trying. Then you stayed for years among the people of Madyan; then you came hither as ordained, O Musa.
ayas.transliteration: idh tamshī ukhtuka fataqūlu hal adullukum `alā man yakfuluh ۖ faraja`nāka ilā ummika kay taqarra `aynuhā walā taḥzan ۚ waqatalta nafsan fanajjaynāka minal ghammi wafatannāka futūnā ۚ falabithta sinīna fī ahli madyana thumma ji-ta `alā qadariy yāmūsā

ayas.arabic: وَٱصْطَنَعْتُكَ لِنَفْسِى
ayas.translation: And I have chosen you for Myself:
ayas.transliteration: waṣṭana`tuka linafsi

ayas.arabic: ٱذْهَبْ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِى وَلَا تَنِيَا فِى ذِكْرِى
ayas.translation: Go you and your brother with My communications and be not remiss in remembering Me;
ayas.transliteration: idh-hab anta wa-akhūka bi-āyātī walā taniyā fī dhikri

ayas.arabic: ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
ayas.translation: Go both to Firon, surely he has become inordinate;
ayas.transliteration: idh-habā ilā fir`awna innahu ṭaghā

ayas.arabic: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوْلًا لَّيِّنًا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوْ يَخْشَىٰ
ayas.translation: Then speak to him a gentle word haply he may mind or fear.
ayas.transliteration: faqūlā lahu qawlal layyinal la`allahu yatadhakkaru aw yakhshā

ayas.arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفْرُطَ عَلَيْنَآ أَوْ أَن يَطْغَىٰ
ayas.translation: Both said: O our Lord! Surely we fear that he may hasten to do evil to us or that he may become inordinate.
ayas.transliteration: qālā rabbanā innanā nakhāfu an yafruṭa `alaynā aw an yaṭghā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآ ۖ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: Fear not, surely I am with you both: I do hear and see.
ayas.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā ۖ innanī ma`akumā asma`u wa-arā

ayas.arabic: فَأْتِيَاهُ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّبْهُمْ ۖ قَدْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۖ وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: So go you both to him and say: Surely we are two apostles of your Lord; therefore send the children of Israel with us and do not torment them! Indeed we have brought to you a communication from your Lord, and peace is on him who follows the guidance;
ayas.transliteration: fa-tiyāhu faqūlā innā rasūlā rabbika fa-arsil ma`anā banī isrā-iyla walā tu`adhhibhum ۖ qad ji-nāka bi-āyatim min rabbik ۖ was salāmu `alā manit-taba`al hudā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا قَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْنَآ أَنَّ ٱلْعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
ayas.translation: Surely it has been revealed to us that the chastisement will surely come upon him who rejects and turns back.
ayas.transliteration: innā qad ūḥiya ilaynā annal `adhāba `alā man kadhhaba watawallā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَمَن رَّبُّكُمَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: (Firon) said: And who is your Lord, O Musa?
ayas.transliteration: qāla faman rabbukumā yāmūsā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: Our Lord is He Who gave to everything its creation, then guided it (to its goal).
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbunal ladhī a`ṭā kulla shay-in khalqahu thumma hadā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا بَالُ ٱلْقُرُونِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: Then what is the state of the former generations?
ayas.transliteration: qāla famā bālul qurūnil-ūlā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَنسَى
ayas.translation: He said: The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a book, my Lord errs not, nor does He forget;
ayas.transliteration: qāla `il-muhā `inda rabbī fī kitāb ۖ lā yaḍillu rabbī walā yansā

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّن نَّبَاتٍ شَتَّىٰ
ayas.translation: Who made the earth for you an expanse and made for you therein paths and sent down water from the cloud; then thereby We have brought forth many species of various herbs.
ayas.transliteration: alladhī ja`ala lakumul-arḍa mahdan wasalaka lakum fīhā subulan wa-anzala minas samā-i mā-an fa-akhrajnā bihi azwājan min nabātin shattā

ayas.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱرْعَوْا۟ أَنْعَـٰمَكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
ayas.translation: Eat and pasture your cattle; most surely there are signs in this for those endowed with understanding.
ayas.transliteration: kulū war`aw an`āmakum ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin li-ulin nuhā

ayas.arabic: مِنْهَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمْ وَمِنْهَا نُخْرِجُكُمْ تَارَةً أُخْرَىٰ
ayas.translation: From it We created you and into it We shall send you back and from it will We raise you a second time.
ayas.transliteration: minhā khalaqnākum wafīhā nu`īdukum wa minhā nukhrijukum tāratan ukhrā

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ
ayas.translation: And truly We showed him Our signs, all of them, but he rejected and refused.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhhaba wa-abā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتُخْرِجَنَا مِنْ أَرْضِنَا بِسِحْرِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: Said he: Have you come to us that you should turn us out of our land by your magic, O Musa?
ayas.transliteration: qāla aji-tanā litukhrijanā min arḍinā bisiḥrika yāmūsā

ayas.arabic: فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّكَ بِسِحْرٍ مِّثْلِهِۦ فَٱجْعَلْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّا نُخْلِفُهُۥ نَحْنُ وَلَآ أَنتَ مَكَانًا سُوًى
ayas.translation: So we too will produce before you magic like it, therefore make between us and you an appointment, which we should not break, (neither) we nor you, (in) a central place.
ayas.transliteration: falana-tiyannaka bisiḥrin mithlihi faj`al baynanā wabaynaka maw`idal lā nukhlifuhu naḥnu walā anta makānan suwā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ مَوْعِدُكُمْ يَوْمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحْشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحًى
ayas.translation: (Musa) said: Your appointment is the day of the Festival and let the people be gathered together in the early forenoon.
ayas.transliteration: qāla maw`idukum yawmuz zīnati wa-an yuḥsharan nāsu ḍuḥā

ayas.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيْدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ
ayas.translation: So Firon turned his back and settled his plan, then came.
ayas.transliteration: fatawallā fir`awnu fajama`a kaydahu thumma atā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ وَيْلَكُمْ لَا تَفْتَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا فَيُسْحِتَكُم بِعَذَابٍ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ
ayas.translation: Musa said to them: Woe to you! do not forge a lie against Allah, lest He destroy you by a punishment, and he who forges (a lie) indeed fails to attain (his desire).
ayas.transliteration: qāla lahum mūsā waylakum lā taftarū `alallāhi kadhiban fayus-ḥitakum bi`adhāb ۖ waqad khāba manif-tarā

ayas.arabic: فَتَنَـٰزَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ
ayas.translation: So they disputed with one another about their affair and kept the discourse secret.
ayas.transliteration: fatanāza`ū amrahum baynahum wa-asarrun najwā

ayas.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَٰنِ لَسَـٰحِرَٰنِ يُرِيدَانِ أَن يُخْرِجَاكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِمَا وَيَذْهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ ٱلْمُثْلَىٰ
ayas.translation: They said: These are most surely two magicians who wish to turn you out from your land by their magic and to take away your best traditions.
ayas.transliteration: qālū in hādhāni lasāḥirāni yurīdāni an yukhrijākum min arḍikum bisiḥrihimā wayadh-habā biṭarīqatikumul muthlā

ayas.arabic: فَأَجْمِعُوا۟ كَيْدَكُمْ ثُمَّ ٱئْتُوا۟ صَفًّا ۚ وَقَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْيَوْمَ مَنِ ٱسْتَعْلَىٰ
ayas.translation: Therefore settle your plan, then come standing in ranks and he will prosper indeed this day who overcomes.
ayas.transliteration: fa-ajmi`ū kaydakum thumma-tū ṣaffā ۚ waqad aflaḥal yawma manis-ta`lā

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَلْقَىٰ
ayas.translation: They said: O Musa! will you cast, or shall we be the first who cast down?
ayas.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tulqiya wa immā an nakūna awwala man alqā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ بَلْ أَلْقُوا۟ ۖ فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمْ وَعِصِيُّهُمْ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيْهِ مِن سِحْرِهِمْ أَنَّهَا تَسْعَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: Nay! cast down. then lo! their cords and their rods-- it was imaged to him on account of their magic as if they were running.
ayas.transliteration: qāla bal alqū ۖ fa-idhā ḥibāluhum wa`iṣiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilayhi min siḥrihim annahā tas`ā

ayas.arabic: فَأَوْجَسَ فِى نَفْسِهِۦ خِيفَةً مُّوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: So Musa conceived in his mind a fear.
ayas.transliteration: fa-awjasa fī nafsihi khīfatan mūsā

ayas.arabic: قُلْنَا لَا تَخَفْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
ayas.translation: We said: Fear not, surely you shall be the uppermost,
ayas.transliteration: qulnā lā takhaf innaka antal-a`lā

ayas.arabic: وَأَلْقِ مَا فِى يَمِينِكَ تَلْقَفْ مَا صَنَعُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّمَا صَنَعُوا۟ كَيْدُ سَـٰحِرٍ ۖ وَلَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلسَّاحِرُ حَيْثُ أَتَىٰ
ayas.translation: And cast down what is in your right hand; it shall devour what they have wrought; they have wrought only the plan of a magician, and the magician shall not be successful wheresoever he may come from.
ayas.transliteration: wa-alqi mā fī yamīnika talqaf mā ṣana`ū ۖ innamā ṣana`ū kaydu sāḥir ۖ walā yufliḥus sāḥiru ḥaythu atā

ayas.arabic: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدًا قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَـٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: And the magicians were cast down making obeisance; they said: We believe in the Lord of Haroun and Musa.
ayas.transliteration: fa-ulqiyas saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wa mūsā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ ۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ فِى جُذُوعِ ٱلنَّخْلِ وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ أَيُّنَآ أَشَدُّ عَذَابًا وَأَبْقَىٰ
ayas.translation: (Firon) said: You believe in him before I give you leave; most surely he is the chief of you who taught you enchantment, therefore I will certainly cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will certainly crucify you on the trunks of the palm trees, and certainly you will come to know which of us is the more severe and the more abiding in chastising.
ayas.transliteration: qāla āmantum lahu qabla an ādhana lakum ۖ innahu lakabīrukumul ladhī `allamakumus siḥr ۖ fala-uqaṭṭi`anna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilāfin wala-uṣallibannakum fī judhū`in nakhli walata`lamunna ayyunā ashaddu `adhāban wa-abqā

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنَا ۖ فَٱقْضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍ ۖ إِنَّمَا تَقْضِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَآ
ayas.translation: They said: We do not prefer you to what has come to us of clear arguments and to He Who made us, therefore decide what you are going to decide; you can only decide about this world's life.
ayas.transliteration: qālū lan nu-thiraka `alā mā jā-anā minal bayyināti wal ladhī faṭaranā ۖ faqḍi mā anta qāḍ ۖ innamā taqḍī hādhihil ḥayātad dunyā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغْفِرَ لَنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَا وَمَآ أَكْرَهْتَنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحْرِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: Surely we believe in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and the magic to which you compelled us; and Allah is better and more abiding.
ayas.transliteration: innā āmannā birabbinā liyaghfira lanā khaṭāyānā wa mā akrahtanā `alayhi minas siḥr ۗ wallāhu khayrun wa-abqā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأْتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجْرِمًا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
ayas.translation: Whoever comes to his Lord (being) guilty, for him is surely hell; he shall not die therein, nor shall he live.
ayas.transliteration: innahu man ya-ti rabbahu mujriman fa-inna lahu jahannama lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā

ayas.arabic: وَمَن يَأْتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنًا قَدْ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتُ ٱلْعُلَىٰ
ayas.translation: And whoever comes to Him a believer (and) he has done good deeds indeed, these it is who shall have the high ranks,
ayas.transliteration: wa man ya-tihi mu-minan qad `amilaṣ ṣāliḥāti fa-ulā-ika lahumud darajātul `ulā

ayas.arabic: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
ayas.translation: The gardens of perpetuity, beneath which rivers flow, to abide therein; and this is the reward of him who has purified himself.
ayas.transliteration: jannātu `adnin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā ۚ wadhālika jazā-u man tazakkā

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى فَٱضْرِبْ لَهُمْ طَرِيقًا فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ يَبَسًا لَّا تَخَـٰفُ دَرَكًا وَلَا تَخْشَىٰ
ayas.translation: And certainly We revealed to Musa, saying: Travel by night with My servants, then make for them a dry path in the sea, not fearing to be overtaken, nor being afraid.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad awḥaynā ilā mūsā an asri bi`ibādī faḍrib lahum ṭarīqan fil baḥri yabasal lā takhāfu darakan walā takhshā

ayas.arabic: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ
ayas.translation: And Firon followed them with his armies, so there came upon them of the sea that which came upon them.
ayas.transliteration: fa-atba`ahum fir`awnu bijunūdihi faghashiyahum minal yammi mā ghashiyahum

ayas.arabic: وَأَضَلَّ فِرْعَوْنُ قَوْمَهُۥ وَمَا هَدَىٰ
ayas.translation: And Firon led astray his people and he did not guide (them) aright.
ayas.transliteration: wa-aḍalla fir`awnu qawmahu wa mā hadā

ayas.arabic: يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ قَدْ أَنجَيْنَـٰكُم مِّنْ عَدُوِّكُمْ وَوَٰعَدْنَـٰكُمْ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنَ وَنَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلْوَىٰ
ayas.translation: O children of Israel! indeed We delivered you from your enemy, and We made a covenant with you on the blessed side of the mountain, and We sent to you the manna and the quails.
ayas.transliteration: yābanī isrā-iyla qad anjaynākum min `aduwwikum wawā`adnākum jānibaṭ ṭūril-aymana wanazzalnā `alaykumul manna was salwā

ayas.arabic: كُلُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَـٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِيهِ فَيَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبِى ۖ وَمَن يَحْلِلْ عَلَيْهِ غَضَبِى فَقَدْ هَوَىٰ
ayas.translation: Eat of the good things We have given you for sustenance, and be not inordinate with respect to them, lest My wrath should be due to you, and to whomsoever My wrath is due be shall perish indeed.
ayas.transliteration: kulū min ṭayyibāti mā razaqnākum walā taṭghaw fīhi fayaḥilla `alaykum ghaḍabī ۖ wa man yaḥlil `alayhi ghaḍabī faqad hawā

ayas.arabic: وَإِنِّى لَغَفَّارٌ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا ثُمَّ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
ayas.translation: And most surely I am most Forgiving to him who repents and believes and does good, then continues to follow the right direction.
ayas.transliteration: wa innī laghaffārul liman tāba wa-āmana wa`amila ṣāliḥan thummah-tadā

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَعْجَلَكَ عَن قَوْمِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: And what caused you to hasten from your people, O Musa?
ayas.transliteration: wa mā a`jalaka `an qawmika yāmūsā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ هُمْ أُو۟لَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِى وَعَجِلْتُ إِلَيْكَ رَبِّ لِتَرْضَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: They are here on my track and I hastened on to Thee, my Lord, that Thou mightest be pleased.
ayas.transliteration: qāla hum ulā-i `alā atharī wa`ajiltu ilayka rabbi litarḍā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدْ فَتَنَّا قَوْمَكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ
ayas.translation: He said: So surely We have tried your people after you, and the Samiri has led them astray.
ayas.transliteration: qāla fa-innā qad fatannā qawmaka min ba`dika wa-aḍallahumus sāmiriyy

ayas.arabic: فَرَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ غَضْبَـٰنَ أَسِفًا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَلَمْ يَعِدْكُمْ رَبُّكُمْ وَعْدًا حَسَنًا ۚ أَفَطَالَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْعَهْدُ أَمْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن يَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ فَأَخْلَفْتُم مَّوْعِدِى
ayas.translation: So Musa returned to his people wrathful, sorrowing. Said he: O my people! did not your Lord promise you a goodly promise: did then the time seem long to you, or did you wish that displeasure from your Lord should be due to you, so that you broke (your) promise to me?
ayas.transliteration: faraja`a mūsā ilā qawmihi ghaḍbāna asifā ۚ qāla yāqawmi alam ya`idkum rabbukum wa`dan ḥasanā ۚ afaṭāla `alaykumul `ahdu am aradtum an yaḥilla `alaykum ghaḍabun min rabbikum fa-akhlaftum maw`idī

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَخْلَفْنَا مَوْعِدَكَ بِمَلْكِنَا وَلَـٰكِنَّا حُمِّلْنَآ أَوْزَارًا مِّن زِينَةِ ٱلْقَوْمِ فَقَذَفْنَـٰهَا فَكَذَٰلِكَ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ
ayas.translation: They said: We did not break (our) promise to you of our own accord, but we were made to bear the burdens of the ornaments of the people, then we made a casting of them, and thus did the Samiri suggest.
ayas.transliteration: qālū mā akhlafnā maw`idaka bimalkinā walākinnā ḥummilnā awzāran min zīnatil qawmi faqadhafnāhā fakadhālika alqas sāmiriyy

ayas.arabic: فَأَخْرَجَ لَهُمْ عِجْلًا جَسَدًا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌ فَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ وَإِلَـٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِىَ
ayas.translation: So he brought forth for them a calf, a (mere) body, which had a mooing sound, so they said: This is your god and the god of Musa, but he forgot.
ayas.transliteration: fa-akhraja lahum `ijlan jasadal lahu khuwārun faqālū hādhā ilāhukum wa ilāhu mūsā fanasiy

ayas.arabic: أَفَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَلَّا يَرْجِعُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَوْلًا وَلَا يَمْلِكُ لَهُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا
ayas.translation: What! could they not see that it did not return to them a reply, and (that) it did not control any harm or benefit for them?
ayas.transliteration: afalā yarawna allā yarji`u ilayhim qawlan walā yamliku lahum ḍarran walā naf`ā

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ قَالَ لَهُمْ هَـٰرُونُ مِن قَبْلُ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنَّمَا فُتِنتُم بِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَٱتَّبِعُونِى وَأَطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرِى
ayas.translation: And certainly Haroun had said to them before: O my people! you are only tried by it, and surely your Lord is the Beneficent Allah, therefore follow me and obey my order.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad qāla lahum hārūnu min qablu yāqawmi innamā futintum bih ۖ wa inna rabbakumur raḥmānu fattabi`ūnī wa-aṭī`ū amrī

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَن نَّبْرَحَ عَلَيْهِ عَـٰكِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرْجِعَ إِلَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: They said: We will by no means cease to keep to its worship until Musa returns to us.
ayas.transliteration: qālū lan nabraḥa `alayhi `ākifīna ḥattā yarji`a ilaynā mūsā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰهَـٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذْ رَأَيْتَهُمْ ضَلُّوٓا۟
ayas.translation: (Musa) said: O Haroun! what prevented you, when you saw them going astray,
ayas.transliteration: qāla yāhārūnu mā mana`aka idh ra-aytahum ḍallū

ayas.arabic: أَلَّا تَتَّبِعَنِ ۖ أَفَعَصَيْتَ أَمْرِى
ayas.translation: So that you did not follow me? Did you then disobey my order?
ayas.transliteration: allā tattabi`an ۖ afa`aṣayta amrī

ayas.arabic: قَالَ يَبْنَؤُمَّ لَا تَأْخُذْ بِلِحْيَتِى وَلَا بِرَأْسِىٓ ۖ إِنِّى خَشِيتُ أَن تَقُولَ فَرَّقْتَ بَيْنَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَمْ تَرْقُبْ قَوْلِى
ayas.translation: He said: O son of my mother! seize me not by my beard nor by my head; surely I was afraid lest you should say: You have caused a division among the children of Israel and not waited for my word.
ayas.transliteration: qāla yabna-umma lā ta-khudh biliḥyatī walā bira-sī ۖ innī khashītu an taqūla farraqta bayna banī isrā-iyla walam tarqub qawlī

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكَ يَـٰسَـٰمِرِىُّ
ayas.translation: He said: What was then your object, O Samiri?
ayas.transliteration: qāla famā khaṭbuka yāsāmiriyy

ayas.arabic: قَالَ بَصُرْتُ بِمَا لَمْ يَبْصُرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضْتُ قَبْضَةً مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذْتُهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتْ لِى نَفْسِى
ayas.translation: He said: I saw (Jibreel) what they did not see, so I took a handful (of the dust) from the footsteps of the messenger, then I threw it in the casting; thus did my soul commend to me
ayas.transliteration: qāla baṣurtu bimā lam yabṣurū bihi faqabaḍtu qabḍatan min atharir rasūli fanabadhtuhā wakadhālika sawwalat lī nafsī

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَٱذْهَبْ فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ أَن تَقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّن تُخْلَفَهُۥ ۖ وَٱنظُرْ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَـٰهِكَ ٱلَّذِى ظَلْتَ عَلَيْهِ عَاكِفًا ۖ لَّنُحَرِّقَنَّهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُۥ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ نَسْفًا
ayas.translation: He said: Begone then, surely for you it will be in this life to say, Touch (me) not; and surely there is a threat for you, which shall not be made to fail to you, and look at your god to whose worship you kept (so long); we will certainly burn it, then we will certainly scatter it a (wide) scattering in the sea.
ayas.transliteration: qāla fadh-hab fa-inna laka fil ḥayāti an taqūla lā misās ۖ wa inna laka maw`idal lan tukhlafah ۖ wanẓur ilā ilāhikal ladhī ẓalta `alayhi `ākifā ۖ lanuḥarriqannahu thumma lanansifannahu fil yammi nasfā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا
ayas.translation: Your Allah is only Allah, there is no god but He; He comprehends all things in (His) knowledge.
ayas.transliteration: innamā ilāhukumullāhul ladhī lā ilāha illā huw ۚ wasi`a kulla shay-in `il-mā

ayas.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدْ سَبَقَ ۚ وَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكْرًا
ayas.translation: Thus do We relate to you (some) of the news of what has gone before; and indeed We have given to you a Reminder from Ourselves.
ayas.transliteration: kadhālika naquṣṣu `alayka min anbā-i mā qad sabaq ۚ waqad ātaynāka min ladunnā dhikrā

ayas.arabic: مَّنْ أَعْرَضَ عَنْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحْمِلُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وِزْرًا
ayas.translation: Whoever turns aside from it, he shall surely bear a burden on the day of resurrection
ayas.transliteration: man a`raḍa `anhu fa-innahu yaḥmilu yawmal qiyāmati wizrā

ayas.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهِ ۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ حِمْلًا
ayas.translation: Abiding in this (state), and evil will it be for them to bear on the day of resurrection;
ayas.transliteration: khālidīna fīh ۖ wasā-a lahum yawmal qiyāmati ḥimlā

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ وَنَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ يَوْمَئِذٍ زُرْقًا
ayas.translation: On the day when the trumpet shall be blown, and We will gather the guilty, blue-eyed, on that day
ayas.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fiṣ ṣūr ۚ wanaḥshurul mujrimīna yawma-idhin zurqā

ayas.arabic: يَتَخَـٰفَتُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا عَشْرًا
ayas.translation: They shall consult together secretly: You did tarry but ten (centuries).
ayas.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labithtum illā `ashrā

ayas.arabic: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذْ يَقُولُ أَمْثَلُهُمْ طَرِيقَةً إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا يَوْمًا
ayas.translation: We know best what they say, when the fairest of them in course would say: You tarried but a day.
ayas.transliteration: naḥnu a`lamu bimā yaqūlūna idh yaqūlu amthaluhum ṭarīqatan in labithtum illā yawmā

ayas.arabic: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْجِبَالِ فَقُلْ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّى نَسْفًا
ayas.translation: And they ask you about the mountains. Say: My Lord will carry them away from the roots.
ayas.transliteration: wayas-alūnaka `anil jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfā

ayas.arabic: فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعًا صَفْصَفًا
ayas.translation: Then leave it a plain, smooth level
ayas.transliteration: fayadharuhā qā`an ṣafṣafā

ayas.arabic: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجًا وَلَآ أَمْتًا
ayas.translation: You shall not see therein any crookedness or unevenness.
ayas.transliteration: lā tarā fīhā `iwajan walā amtā

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِىَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥ ۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلْأَصْوَاتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَلَا تَسْمَعُ إِلَّا هَمْسًا
ayas.translation: On that day they shall follow the inviter, there is no crookedness in him, and the voices shall be low before the Beneficent Allah so that you shall not hear aught but a soft sound.
ayas.transliteration: yawma-idhiy yattabi`ūnad dā`iya lā `iwaja lah ۖ wakhasha`atil-aṣwātu lirraḥmāni falā tasma`u illā hamsā

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَرَضِىَ لَهُۥ قَوْلًا
ayas.translation: On that day shall no intercession avail except of him whom the Beneficent Allah allows and whose word He is pleased with.
ayas.transliteration: yawma-idhin lā tanfa`ush shafā`atu illā man adhina lahur raḥmānu waraḍiya lahu qawlā

ayas.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلْمًا
ayas.translation: He knows what is before them and what is behind them, while they do not comprehend it in knowledge.
ayas.transliteration: ya`lamu mā bayna aydīhim wa mā khalfahum walā yuḥīṭūna bihi `il-mā

ayas.arabic: وَعَنَتِ ٱلْوُجُوهُ لِلْحَىِّ ٱلْقَيُّومِ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ حَمَلَ ظُلْمًا
ayas.translation: And the faces shall be humbled before the Living, the Self-subsistent Allah, and he who bears iniquity is indeed a failure.
ayas.transliteration: wa`anatil wujūhu lilḥayyil qayyūm ۖ waqad khāba man ḥamala ẓul-mā

ayas.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلْمًا وَلَا هَضْمًا
ayas.translation: And whoever does good works and he is a believer, he shall have no fear of injustice nor of the withholding of his due.
ayas.transliteration: wa man ya`mal minaṣ ṣāliḥāti wahuwa mu-minun falā yakhāfu ẓul-man walā haḍmā

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا وَصَرَّفْنَا فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلْوَعِيدِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ أَوْ يُحْدِثُ لَهُمْ ذِكْرًا
ayas.translation: And thus have We sent it down an Arabic Quran, and have distinctly set forth therein of threats that they may guard (against evil) or that it may produce a reminder for them.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu qur-ānan `arabiyyan waṣarrafnā fīhi minal wa`īdi la`allahum yattaqūna aw yuḥdithu lahum dhikrā

ayas.arabic: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ وَلَا تَعْجَلْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يُقْضَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَحْيُهُۥ ۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِى عِلْمًا
ayas.translation: Supremely exalted is therefore Allah, the King, the Truth, and do not make haste with the Quran before its revelation is made complete to you and say: O my Lord! increase me in knowledge.
ayas.transliteration: fata`ālallāhul malikul ḥaqq ۗ walā ta`jal bil qur-āni min qabli an yuqḍā ilayka waḥyuh ۖ waqul rabbi zidnī `il-mā

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ عَهِدْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبْلُ فَنَسِىَ وَلَمْ نَجِدْ لَهُۥ عَزْمًا
ayas.translation: And certainly We gave a commandment to Adam before, but he forgot; and We did not find in him any determination.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad `ahidnā ilā ādama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu `azmā

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ
ayas.translation: And when We said to the angels: Make obeisance to Adam, they made obeisance, but Iblis (did it not); he refused.
ayas.transliteration: wa idh qulnā lil-malā-ikatis-judū li-ādama fasajadū illā iblīsa abā

ayas.arabic: فَقُلْنَا يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا عَدُوٌّ لَّكَ وَلِزَوْجِكَ فَلَا يُخْرِجَنَّكُمَا مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ فَتَشْقَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: So We said: O Adam! This is an enemy to you and to your wife; therefore let him not drive you both forth from the garden so that you should be unhappy;
ayas.transliteration: faqulnā yā-ādamu inna hādhā `aduwwul laka walizawjika falā yukhrijannakumā minal jannati fatashqā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعْرَىٰ
ayas.translation: Surely it is (ordained) for you that you shall not be hungry therein nor bare of clothing;
ayas.transliteration: inna laka allā tajū`a fīhā walā ta`rā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظْمَؤُا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضْحَىٰ
ayas.translation: And that you shall not be thirsty therein nor shall you feel the heat of the sun.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍ-ḥā

ayas.arabic: فَوَسْوَسَ إِلَيْهِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ قَالَ يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلْخُلْدِ وَمُلْكٍ لَّا يَبْلَىٰ
ayas.translation: But the Shaitan made an evil suggestion to him; he said: O Adam! Shall I guide you to the tree of immortality and a kingdom which decays not?
ayas.transliteration: fawaswasa ilayhish shayṭānu qāla yā-ādamu hal adulluka `alā shajaratil khuldi wa mulkin lā yablā

ayas.arabic: فَأَكَلَا مِنْهَا فَبَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ
ayas.translation: Then they both ate of it, so their evil inclinations became manifest to them, and they both began to cover themselves with leaves of the garden, and Adam disobeyed his Lord, so his life became evil (to him).
ayas.transliteration: fa-akalā minhā fabadat lahumā saw-ātuhumā waṭafiqā yakhṣifāni `alayhimā min waraqil jannah ۚ wa`aṣā ādamu rabbahu faghawā

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجْتَبَـٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ وَهَدَىٰ
ayas.translation: Then his Lord chose him, so He turned to him and guided (him).
ayas.transliteration: thummaj-tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba `alayhi wahadā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ ٱهْبِطَا مِنْهَا جَمِيعًۢا ۖ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّى هُدًى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشْقَىٰ
ayas.translation: He said: Get forth you two therefrom, all (of you), one of you (is) enemy to another. So there will surely come to you guidance from Me, then whoever follows My guidance, he shall not go astray nor be unhappy;
ayas.transliteration: qālah-biṭā minhā jamī`ā ۖ ba`ḍukum liba`ḍin `aduww ۖ fa-immā ya-tiyannakum minnī hudan famanit-taba`a hudāya falā yaḍillu walā yashqā

ayas.arabic: وَمَنْ أَعْرَضَ عَن ذِكْرِى فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةً ضَنكًا وَنَحْشُرُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ أَعْمَىٰ
ayas.translation: And whoever turns away from My reminder, his shall be a straitened life, and We will raise him on the day of resurrection, blind.
ayas.transliteration: wa man a`raḍa `an dhikrī fa-inna lahu ma`īshatan ḍankan wanaḥshuruhu yawmal qiyāmati a`mā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرْتَنِىٓ أَعْمَىٰ وَقَدْ كُنتُ بَصِيرًا
ayas.translation: He shall say: My Lord! why hast Thou raised me blind and I was a seeing one indeed?
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī a`mā waqad kuntu baṣīrā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَا ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ تُنسَىٰ
ayas.translation: He will say: Even so, Our communications came to you but you neglected them; even thus shall you be forsaken this day.
ayas.transliteration: qāla kadhālika atatka āyātunā fanasītahā ۖ wakadhālikal yawma tunsā

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَنْ أَسْرَفَ وَلَمْ يُؤْمِنۢ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: And thus do We recompense him who is extravagant and does not believe in the communications of his Lord, and certainly the chastisement of the hereafter is severer and more
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika najzī man asrafa walam yu-min bi-āyāti rabbih ۚ wala`adhābul-ākhirati ashaddu wa-abqā

ayas.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَهْدِ لَهُمْ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ يَمْشُونَ فِى مَسَـٰكِنِهِمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ
ayas.translation: Does it not then direct them aright how many of the generations In whose dwelling-places they go about We destroyed before them? Most surely there are signs in this for those endowed with understanding.
ayas.transliteration: afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknā qablahum minal qurūni yamshūna fī masākinihim ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin li-ulin nuhā

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامًا وَأَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى
ayas.translation: And had there not been a word (that had) already gone forth from your Lord and an appointed term, it would surely have been made to cleave (to them).
ayas.transliteration: walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakāna lizāman wa-ajalun musammā

ayas.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ غُرُوبِهَا ۖ وَمِنْ ءَانَآئِ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْ وَأَطْرَافَ ٱلنَّهَارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرْضَىٰ
ayas.translation: Bear then patiently what they say, and glorify your Lord by the praising of Him before the rising of the sun and before its setting, and during hours of the night do also glorify (Him) and during parts of the day, that you may be well pleased
ayas.transliteration: faṣbir `alā mā yaqūlūna wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika qabla ṭulū`ish shamsi waqabla ghurūbihā ۖ wa min ānā-il layli fasabbiḥ wa-aṭrāfan nahāri la`allaka tarḍā

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ زَهْرَةَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَرِزْقُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
ayas.translation: And do not stretch your eyes after that with which We have provided different classes of them, (of) the splendor of this world's life, that We may thereby try them; and the sustenance (given) by your Lord is better and more abiding.
ayas.transliteration: walā tamuddanna `aynayka ilā mā matta`nā bihi azwājan minhum zahratal ḥayātid dunyā linaftinahum fīh ۚ warizqu rabbika khayrun wa-abqā

ayas.arabic: وَأْمُرْ أَهْلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصْطَبِرْ عَلَيْهَا ۖ لَا نَسْـَٔلُكَ رِزْقًا ۖ نَّحْنُ نَرْزُقُكَ ۗ وَٱلْعَـٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ
ayas.translation: And enjoin prayer on your followers, and steadily adhere to it; We do not ask you for subsistence; We do give you subsistence, and the (good) end is for guarding (against evil).
ayas.transliteration: wa-mur ahlaka biṣ ṣalāti waṣṭabir `alayhā ۖ lā nas-aluka rizqā ۖ naḥnu narzuquk ۗ wal `āqibatu littaqwā

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا يَأْتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓ ۚ أَوَلَمْ تَأْتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
ayas.translation: And they say: Why does he not bring to us a sign from his Lord? Has not there come to them a clear evidence of what is in the previous books?
ayas.transliteration: waqālū lawlā ya-tīnā bi-āyatim min rabbih ۚ awalam ta-tihim bayyinatu mā fiṣ ṣuḥufil-ūlā

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّآ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِعَذَابٍ مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ لَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا لَوْلَآ أَرْسَلْتَ إِلَيْنَا رَسُولًا فَنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَـٰتِكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن نَّذِلَّ وَنَخْزَىٰ
ayas.translation: And had We destroyed them with chastisement before this, they would certainly have said: O our Lord! why didst Thou not send to us an apostle, for then we should have followed Thy communications before that we met disgrace and shame.
ayas.transliteration: walaw annā ahlaknāhum bi`adhābin min qablihi laqālū rabbanā lawlā arsalta ilaynā rasūlan fanattabi`a āyātika min qabli an nadhilla wanakhzā

ayas.arabic: قُلْ كُلٌّ مُّتَرَبِّصٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِىِّ وَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
ayas.translation: Say: Every one (of us) is awaiting, therefore do await: So you will come to know who is the follower of the even path and who goes aright.
ayas.transliteration: qul kullun mutarabbiṣun fatarabbaṣū ۖ fasata`lamūna man aṣ-ḥābuṣ ṣirāṭis sawiyyi wa manih-tadā
